divs: Sighting DetailsWell this happen about a year ago and we were going on the street when we looked in the sky and there was this light that looked like a commet but it stayed still. It was around 3 in the afternoon and the sun was out so we thought well it might be a reflection, but up in the sky there couldn't be anything that could stand still that high and make this light iand it stood still no matter what angle we shot at it. And I know I wasn't the only one watching as soon as I was taking pictures of this a lot more people started taking their cameras out. I don't now what this was and would like to know if you something about it. Im kind of interested in what I sasw

Summary: very strange light that stayed still in the sky
